OrgName: Audio Visual Services Group, Inc. d/b/a PSAV
activities: Through our Website, PSAV collects information that can identify site visitors, such as name, organization affiliation, role (job title), phone number, email address and other free-form information entered (usually via a ‘comments’ field) when it is voluntarily submitted. This information is used to perform speedy and accurate return communication and not used in subsequent promotions, email lists or other marketing campaigns. We do not store this information, but may use it to send a system-generated email confirmation to the site visitor and forward the entered information to an appropriate internal manager for review and follow up.
industrysector: Audio/Visual Equipment - (AUV)Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)Hotel & Restaurant Equipment - (HTL)Telecommunications Services - (TES)
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
